text: Xscape is the twelfth studio album by the American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson. It was released on May 9, 2014 by Epic Records. It is the second studio album by Michael Jackson released after his death. ==Track listing== # Love Never Felt So Good # Chicago # Loving You # A Place with No Name # Slave to the Rhythm # Do You Know Where Your Children Are # Blue Gangsta # Xscape Category:2014 albums Category:Michael Jackson albums
title: Xscape (album)
